body:
I'd say I'm pretty well known here - I have been apart of this community for over 3 years, I was a mod for almost one of those years and I'm currently mapdev and media. I have played and lead for Apollo in every tourney and have never finished below 3rd place. I'm currently in grim on OCN and a mod on Badlion.

if you want a super honest opinion, put a * on your post
body_tagged:

replies.body:
I never really had talked to you in the past before I decided to trial you, only in mega scrims really. I wanted to trial you because like Seuth, I thought you were going to become a really good player.

I do feel you are becoming a better player but you are far from being complete.

You are a really nice guy to talk to because you are so chilled out; I haven't spoken to you alot but when I do speak to you I do think you are a great guy to talk to.

You did good in the tourney, well done.

replies.body:
I think you were a good Jr Mod, although I think that you were quite argumentative. You should be a mod now though, I feel that your demotion wasn't fair at all. I haven't spoken to you properly but you seem to be an alright person, although I don't understand why you like throwback maps :V

I do not ever plan to return to the mod team, many of my friends returned and retired straight away, and I do not agree with how it is run, or any of the decisions that they make. They are way too inactive as a team at certain hours in my opinion. I'd rather stick to moderating Badlion.

I think Cacalmarin could be a good team if they actually practiced but since they're Aussie it's hard for them.

replies.body:
I trailed you for Apollo because you were a defender and we needed defenders but also because you formed a strong bond with Eric.

You've come a long way as a defender but you still have to improve at stuff. I don't know how people get your objectives but I presume it's because you jump straight into melee.

In ctw you should only melee the player if you feel they can get in your wool, and support is NOT coming. If there's someone in your wall, you'd drop, but if someone is in your pit you can hold them off while support comes.

in DTM you shouldn't ever have to take melee, you should just bow until support comes, especially since after killing you it takes up to 20 seconds to secure a monument.

If you need help at defending just ask me and I'll help you.

I find you a bit annoying on teamspeak, but I suppose it's got something to do with your age. You are improving as a mapdev and I like to see how far you have come.
replies.body_tagged:
I trailed you for Apollo because you were a defender and we needed defenders but also because you formed a strong bond with Eric.

You've come a long way as a defender but you still have to improve at stuff. I don't know how people get your objectives but I presume it's because you jump straight into melee.

In ctw you should only melee the player if you feel they can get in your wool, and support is NOT coming. If there's someone in your wall, you'd drop, but if someone is in your pit you can hold them off while support comes.

in DTM you shouldn't ever have to take melee, you should just bow until support comes, especially since after killing you it takes up to 20 seconds to secure a monument.

If you need help at defending just ask me and I'll help you.

I find you a bit annoying on teamspeak, but I suppose it's got something to do with your age. You are improving as a mapdev and I like to see how far you have come.
